original_text: For they are my servants, whom I brought out of the land of Egypt; they shall not be sold as slaves.
korean_text: 그들은 내가 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 낸 내 종들이니 종으로 팔지 말 것이라

sentences.original_text: whom I brought out of the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 낸 자들이니

sentences.original_text: they shall not be sold as slaves
